nodes.bodyText: Adding the new version might be an async operation - do we need a check before this Patch operation to make sure the version added above exists and is in the expected state?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -376,8 +405,8 @@ public void testPatchSchemaVersionState() throws Exception {
                 .patch("/ibmcompat/schemas/" + schemaName + "/versions/2")
             .then()
                 .statusCode(200)
-                .body("name", equalTo(schemaName))
-                .body("id", equalTo(schemaName))
+                .body("name", equalTo(schemaId))
+                .body("id", equalTo(schemaId))
                 .body("enabled", is(true))
                 .body("state.state", equalTo("active"))
                 .body("versions.size()", is(2))

nodes.bodyText: Good idea - I've added a waitForVersion method & used it where appropriate.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -376,8 +405,8 @@ public void testPatchSchemaVersionState() throws Exception {
                 .patch("/ibmcompat/schemas/" + schemaName + "/versions/2")
             .then()
                 .statusCode(200)
-                .body("name", equalTo(schemaName))
-                .body("id", equalTo(schemaName))
+                .body("name", equalTo(schemaId))
+                .body("id", equalTo(schemaId))
                 .body("enabled", is(true))
                 .body("state.state", equalTo("active"))
                 .body("versions.size()", is(2))
